title: A parallel-plate capacitor is charged and the b...

content.question: A parallel-plate capacitor is charged and the battery is removed. If a dielectric with dielectric constant k > 1 is then inserted in the capacitor, which of the following will decrease?

choices.label: The charge on one of the capacitor plates
The distance between the capacitor plates

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
